Past members

Sangjin

Introduction

Jins (Korean: 진스; Japanese: ジンス) is a four member South Korean co-ed band. The group’s name derives from the facts that all the original members’ names contained the character 진 (Jin). They debuted on December 10, 2018 with the single album Affogato (아포가토).

On July 28, 2021, the group took to their Instagram to announce that Sangjin would be leaving the group.
